Twister/Blizzard


Twister: I was sent on a mission to stop another bot nam=
ed Retroflame. She planed to blow up some other bots that didn't know a thi=
ng because she claimed that they were in her way. I was given no partners f=
or there were none to give. I didn't stop them....I tried but I was shelfis=
h and excaped in a pod thinking of only myself and other bots were killed n=
ot only because of Retroflame but also because of me....I deserved to be ne=
ar that bomb.....There were missions before that but I wish not speak of fo=
r I have failed too many.......I wouldn't kill myself for I would probably =
be sent back down for the Matrix would not want my selfish kind in.......

=
*Twister says to Sinesis*


*Blizzard sighs and looks up again still frowni=
ng*

Blizzard: We need to find shelter, my love.

*Blizzard says to Siniste=
r*

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: THECODE 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
  Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 3:30 AM
  Subject: Re: The End is Nea=
r...........


  Sinesis walks to Twister.

  "A failure? When were you a f=
ailure? Tell me of one of your adventures on Cybertron that was a failure."=
 Sinesis said. Sinister shook his head.

  "Unbelievable." Sinister said. S=
tronghold and Blender look at eahc other. They laugh at Plintissa and Draco=
na's misfortune and take a smoke, then walk off to find another side to joi=
n, all the time hoping that Artist suffers and hoping that Twister really i=
s and always will be a failure...
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    Fro=
m: ilovealllizards 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
    Sent: Saturday, August =
05, 2000 3:22 AM
    Subject: Re: The End is Near...........


    Twister/=
Blizzard


    *Twister looks at what was left of the base*

    Twister: I=
 always be nothing but a failer with nowhere to go...

    *Twister walks n=
ext to the pieces of the base sits down staring at the ground*


    *Blizz=
ard frowns and a mech tear runs out of her optic*

    Blizzard: I'll never=
 have a place to stay that I can actually call home.....

    *Blizzard low=
ers her head and sighs*

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: TH=
ECODE 
      To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Saturday, August 05, 2000 =
3:10 AM
      Subject: The End is Near...........


      Dracona looked in=
to the pit. Plintissa wasn't moving. Dracona smiled and walked back toward =
her base. A dagger flew into Dracona's back. She spun around and grabbed th=
e dagger in pain. Plintissa stood there.

      "You do not know when to gi=
ve up, you fool, but never mind that your an idiot, I'm going to grind you =
so small you won't be able to be seen with a microscope!" Dracona said. She=
 kept her hand covered and flung the dagger back. It missed Plintissa and h=
it Artist in the leg. Dracona smiled in satisfaction. Plintissa tackled Dac=
ona and took her down. Dracona once again turned to her saw blade to saw in=
to Plintissa. Dracona fired an ice beam, but Plintissa dodged. Dracona star=
ted to burn everything with fire beams. Plintissa still avoids it. Plintiss=
a was always a good fighter, but it wasn't until now, after her bad life th=
at she discovered her true fighting power. Plintissa beat Dracona merciless=
ly. Draocona's parts were flung everywhere as Plintissa spun a simple stick=
 through the air. Dracona raised the saw blade and sliced the stick to piec=
es. Dracona laughed and sliced Plintissa several hundred times. Plintissa f=
ell.

      "Th weak move aside and die so the strong can survive. As ancie=
nt as the Cosmos, that has always been the way of things. I'm sorry Plintis=
sa, you were a good friend, but don't take this personally, it's just busin=
ess." Dracona said.
       
      Dracona pulled back the saw blade and thr=
ust it towards Plintissa. Plintissa grabbed her arm from earlier and threw =
it. It hit Dracona's blade. Dracona slammed it into Plintissa, but as she d=
id, the blade came loose before it hit Plintissa. The blade flew up. Dracon=
a blinked her eye, the one Dinobot had scarred when she first arived on the=
 planet. The blade sawed through Dracona and left her in pieces everywhere.=
 Her spark extinguished. Her last words were:

      "*Cough, Cough* Zardus=
 I am sorry. Plintissa, do not forget your promise." And Dracona died smili=
ng. Plintissa remembered that she promised Dracona that she would never lea=
ve her sitting. Plintissa cried. Her mech fluid ran everywhere and she got =
weaker and weaker. Artist stepped slowly over to Plintissa. He was crying, =
too.

      "Artist, I'm sorry it had to end this way." Plintissa whispered=
.

      "Why are you leaving me, Plintissa? Why does everyone betray me?" =
Artist asked.

      "Artist, there floats Dracona's spark, recover it, we =
can't part, she really was my friend." Artist walked up and captured the ex=
tinguished spark as it tried to fly away. He contained it in a capsule.

  =
    "Plintissa, if you leave me, I'll...have no more reason to live, all my=
 friends are gone, my helping days are over." Artist said.

      "Your hel=
ping days are never over, and we'll always be together." Plintissa said.

 =
     "This isn't some lame thing about how you'll always be in my heart, is=
 it?"

      "No, Artist, come here." Plintissa whispered. Artist looked at=
 Team Ultima's base. It was destroyed, the funny thing was, that it was des=
troyed by Dracona, the very one, along with Plintissa, that originally buil=
t it. And there it was, sticking above ground now and burning away. Sinesis=
 looks at the base and sighs.

      "Twister, Dracona is dead, I guess we =
have to leave." Sinesis says. Sinister stands next to Blizzard and sighs.

=
      "Blizzard, we need to find another home, now." Sinister said sadly.

=
      Artist came closer to Plintissa. Her spark suddenly burst from her an=
d floated into Artist's hands. She said to him what he needed to do. He ope=
ned his chest compartment and his spark was revealed. Artist combined Plint=
issa's spark with his own, they became one.

      "Till all are one." Arti=
st whispered really low. Plintissa told him she still loved him. Artist was=
 overjoyed! Plintissa was with him now, and now they could never be seperat=
ed again. Artist, completely ignoring Blizzard and Sinister, and Sinesis an=
d Twister. ran out into a field.

      "Artist, now we need to take care o=
f Dracona's spark." Plintissa said. (Remember, only Artist can hear Plintis=
sa now) Artist headed toward the Maximal base, there Dracona would get a ne=
w body, one she could not attack anyone ever again in, and where she can al=
ways be helpful. Artist held up the contained, Dracona's spark still inside=
.

      "I love you." Artist said seemingly to nobody.

      "I love you =
too." Plintissa said to Artist. Artist continued walking to the Maximal bas=
e...
